_a-0000ee15-bcab-8000-9e1f-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_captureMetaDataForTask
_a-0000ee15-bcab-8000-9e1f-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!flatten(
  rule!AS_GSS_UT_captureMetadataForRecords(
    recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD,
    modifiedBy: ri!initiator,
    createdByField: recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.createdBy,
    createdOnField: recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime,
    modifiedByField: recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy,
    modifiedOnField: recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime,
    isActiveField: {},
    data: rule!AS_GSS_UT_updateRecordsByModelRecord(
      records: ri!task,
      modelRecord: recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD(
        recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.createdBy: a!defaultValue(
          value: ri!task[recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.createdBy],
          default: ri!initiator
        ),
        recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime: a!defaultValue(
          value: ri!task[recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime],
          default: now()
        )
      )
    )
  )
)

_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_QR_getEvaluationDocuments
_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryRecord(
  recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationDocumentId,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationDocumentId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.consensusId,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!consensusId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.docType,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!docTypeId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.sourceApplicationId,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!sourceApplicationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.appianDocId,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!appianDocId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.isDeleted,
      operator: "in",
      value: a!defaultValue(value: ri!isDeleted, default: { false })
    ),
    ri!filters
  },
  sort: ri!sortInfo,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  fields: ri!fields,
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData
)

_a-0000ee01-ec73-8000-9e19-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_QR_getEvalVendorPriceBreakup
_a-0000ee01-ec73-8000-9e19-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryRecord(
  recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD,
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  aggregationFields: ri!aggregationFields,
  fields: ri!fields,
  relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.evalVendorId,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evalVendorId,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_checkIsNullOrEmpty(
        value: ri!evalVendorId
      )
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  sort: ri!sort
)

_a-0000ee0b-274d-8000-9e1b-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_FM_evaluationTaskForLpta
_a-0000ee0b-274d-8000-9e1b-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!bundle: rule!AS_GSS_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null),
  local!isSLGToggleOn: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
    nullableValue: ri!isSLGToggleOn,
    replacementValue: rule!AS_GSS_EnableOrDisableStateAndLocalGovernment_wrapper()
  ),
  local!pageConfig: a!refreshVariable(
    value: rule!AS_GSS_updatePagingConfigurationForLptaEvaluation(
      allEvaluationVendors: ri!allEvaluationVendors
    ),
    refreshOnReferencedVarChange: false()
  ),
  local!consolidatedDocs: rule!AS_GSS_UT_returnConsolidatedDocListForLPTAEvaluationTask(
    bundle: local!bundle,
    vendor: ri!allEvaluationVendors[local!pageConfig.currentVendorIndex],
    evaluation: ri!evaluation
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_formLayout_v1"(
    skipAutoFocus: true(),
    backgroundColor: rule!AS_GSS_BrandingValueByKey(
      brandingKey: "DefaultBackground",
      useSuiteBranding: true
    ),
    label: "LPTA Evaluation",
    instructions: "Required fields are marked with an asterisk (*)",
    contents: rule!AS_GSS_CPS_lptaEvaluationTaskContentsPerVendor(
      bundle: local!bundle,
      pageConfig: local!pageConfig,
      isSLGToggleOn: local!isSLGToggleOn,
      consolidatedDocs: local!consolidatedDocs,
      evaluationVendor: ri!allEvaluationVendors[local!pageConfig.currentVendorIndex]
    ),
    buttons:rule!AS_GSS_BTN_buttonsForLPTAEvaluationTask(
      bundle: local!bundle,
      pageConfig: local!pageConfig,
      buttonAction: ri!buttonAction,
      allEvaluationVendors: ri!allEvaluationVendors,
      currentEvaluationvendor: ri!allEvaluationVendors[local!pageConfig.currentVendorIndex]
    )
  )
)

#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_documentDownloadLink"(
  document: ri!document,
  label: rule!AS_CO_UT_createDocumentDownloadLinkLabel(label: ri!label),
  showWhen: and(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_booleanDefaultTrue(ri!showWhen),
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!document)
  )
)

_a-0000ed77-8e71-8000-9df8-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_formatDocumentSingleClickDownloadLink
_a-0000ed77-8e71-8000-9df8-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  or(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!source),
    a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!appianDocId)
  ),
  null,
  concat(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_getSiteUrl(),
    "webapi/fetchDocumentFromExtSource?source=",
    externalize(ri!source),
    "&appianDocId=",
    externalize(ri!appianDocId)
  )
)

  recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_FactorDocumentMapping_SYNCEDRECORD,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_FactorDocumentMapping_SYNCEDRECORD.documentId,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationDocumentId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_FactorDocumentMapping_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive,
      operator: "in",
      value: a!defaultValue(value: ri!isActive, default: { true })
    ),
    ri!additionalfilters
  },
  sort: ri!sortInfo,

  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,

_a-0000ed8a-02db-8000-9dfc-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_displayDocumentName
_a-0000ed8a-02db-8000-9dfc-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  a!isNullOrEmpty(value: ri!document),
  {},
  a!match(
    value: ri!sourceApplicationId,
    equals: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_SOURCE_APPLICATION_VM,
    then: rule!AS_GSS_UT_displayVmDocumentName(
      documentName: ri!documentName,
      extension: ri!extension,
      version: ri!version,
      bundle: ri!bundle
    ),
    default: rule!AS_GSS_UT_findDocumentNameAndExtensionById(documetId: ri!document).nameWithExtension
  )
)

_a-0000ed49-6a91-8000-9dee-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UTIL_processDocumentName
_a-0000ed49-6a91-8000-9dee-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!hasNoExtension: search(".", ri!docName) = 0,
  local!namePart: if(
    local!hasNoExtension,
    ri!docName,
    regexsearch(
      pattern: ".*(?=\.)",
      searchString: ri!docName,
      regexFlags: "i"
    )[1].match
  ),
  local!extension: if(
    local!hasNoExtension,
    "",
    regexsearch(
      pattern: "[^\.]*$",
      searchString: ri!docName,
      regexFlags: "i"
    )[1].match
  ),
  a!map(
    nameWithExtension: concat(local!namePart, ".", local!extension),
    name: local!namePart,
    extension: local!extension
  )
)

_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel
_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
  with(
    local!bundleKeyParse: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_parseBundleKey(bundleKey: ri!bundleKey),
    local!label: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName),
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey],
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName][local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey]
    ),
    local!updatedLabel: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
      nullableValue: local!label,
      replacementValue: ri!bundleKey
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!arguments),
      local!updatedLabel,
      reduce(
        rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_replaceArgument(input: _, index: _, arguments: ri!arguments),
        local!updatedLabel,
        enumerate(count(ri!arguments)) + 1
      )
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments
  )
)

_a-0000eb72-c933-8000-9d28-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_QR_getEvaluation
_a-0000eb72-c933-8000-9d28-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryRecord(
  recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD,
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  aggregationFields: ri!aggregationFields,
  fields: ri!fields,
  relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationNumber,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationNumber
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationStatusId,
      operator: "in",
      value: {
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_SETTING_UP,
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_INPROGRESS,
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_COMPLETE
      }
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  sort: ri!sort
)

_a-0000e70f-2824-8000-9c01-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_filterRecordByFieldValues
_a-0000e70f-2824-8000-9c01-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
cast(
  typeof(a!flatten(ri!records)),
  filter(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_zInternal_filterRecordByFieldValue_Multiple(
      record: _,
      field: ri!field,
      values: ri!values
    ),
    a!flatten(ri!records)
  )
)

_a-0000ee1d-9c3f-8000-9e21-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_cardLayout"(
  contents: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_imageField_v1"(
      labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
      images: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_documentImage"(
        document: cons!AS_GSS_DOCUMENTS_EMPTY_STATE_IMAGE
      ),
      size: "TINY",
      align: "CENTER",
      marginAbove: "MORE"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
      align: "CENTER",
      value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
        text: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
          i18nData: ri!bundle,
          bundleKey: "ins_NoDocsAvailable"
        )
      ),
      marginBelow: "MORE"
    )
  },
  style: rule!AS_GSS_BrandingValueByKey(
    brandingKey: "WhiteOne",
    useSuiteBranding: true
  ),
  shape: "SEMI_ROUNDED",
  padding: "STANDARD",
  marginBelow: "STANDARD",
  showBorder: false,
  showShadow: true
)

_a-0000ece3-e0bc-8000-9dcb-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryRecord(
  recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD,
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  aggregationFields: ri!aggregationFields,
  fields: ri!fields,
  relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData,

    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId,

    ),
    ri!additionalFilters

)

_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_displayDocumentSize
_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  ri!sourceApplicationId = cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_SOURCE_APPLICATION_VM,
  cons!AS_GSS_CO_NULL_REPLACEABLE_TEXT,
  a!localVariables(
    local!size: document(ri!document, "size"),
    a!match(
      value: local!size,
      whenTrue: fv!value < 1024,
      then: round(document(ri!document, "size"), 0) & " B",
      whenTrue: fv!value < 1024 * 1024,
      then: round(document(ri!document, "size") / 1024, 0) & " KB",
      whenTrue: fv!value < 1024 * 1024 * 1024,
      then: round(
        document(ri!document, "size") / 1024 / 1024,
        1
      ) & " MB",
      default: round(
        document(ri!document, "size") / 1024 / 1024 / 1024,
        2
      ) & " GB"
    )
  )
)

_a-0000ed49-6a91-8000-9dee-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_findDocumentNameAndExtensionById
_a-0000ed49-6a91-8000-9dee-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!rawDetails: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!documetId),
    "",
    getcontentobjectdetailsbyid(ri!documetId)
  ),
  local!wholeName: index(
    extract(local!rawDetails, "[Name: ", ", UUID:"),
    1,
    null()
  ),
  rule!AS_GSS_UTIL_processDocumentName(docName: local!wholeName)
)

_a-0000ee0b-274d-8000-9e1b-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_SEC_priceBreakupForLPTAEvaluationTask
